content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Busy professionals with limited time but a desire to learn new skills",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "An online course platform that allows students to learn at their own pace, with pre-recorded video lessons and exercises",
    "content_solution": "A membership site that regularly delivers bite-sized content on a specific topic, such as weekly newsletters or short video tutorials",
    "competitors": "Udemy, Coursera, LinkedIn Learning",
    "differentiator": "Customizable learning paths based on individual goals and schedules"
  },
  {
    "problem": "People who want to learn a new language but don't have the time or resources to attend traditional language classes",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "An app that uses AI to personalize language learning, with speech recognition and interactive exercises",
    "content_solution": "A podcast that teaches conversational language skills, with each episode focusing on a different topic or situation",
    "competitors": "Duolingo, Rosetta Stone",
    "differentiator": "Focus on conversation skills and cultural immersion"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Parents who want to teach their children music but don't have experience or time to teach them",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "An interactive app that teaches children the basics of music theory and instrument playing through games and exercises",
    "content_solution": "A YouTube channel that teaches children how to play various instruments, with video tutorials and song covers",
    "competitors": "MusiQuest, Simply Piano",
    "differentiator": "Emphasis on fun and engaging learning experiences for children"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals who want to start a business but have limited knowledge or experience in entrepreneurship",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "An online course or coaching program that provides step-by-step guidance on starting and running a business",
    "content_solution": "A podcast or blog that shares inspiring stories and practical tips from successful entrepreneurs",
    "competitors": "StartupNation, Entrepreneurial Mindset",
    "differentiator": "Focus on niche industries and underserved markets"
  },
  {
    "problem": "People who want to improve their physical fitness but have limited time or access to a gym",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "An app that provides personalized workout plans and tracks progress, with video demonstrations and audio guidance",
    "content_solution": "A YouTube channel or blog that shares workout routines and healthy lifestyle tips, with motivational content",
    "competitors": "Fitbit, MyFitnessPal",
    "differentiator": "Focus on body-weight exercises and outdoor workouts"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals who want to improve their mental health but have limited access to therapy or counseling services",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "An app that provides self-help tools and resources, such as cognitive behavioral therapy exercises and mindfulness practices",
    "content_solution": "A blog or podcast that shares personal stories and expert advice on managing mental health, with a focus on stigma reduction",
    "competitors": "BetterHelp, Talkspace",
    "differentiator": "Access to a supportive community and peer-to-peer support"
  }
]
